achievements.name: Be like Elon Musk
achievements.description: Earn more than Elon Musk ($250,000,000,000+).

achievements.name: The Empire Strikes Back
achievements.description: Purchase a 1:1 scale Death Star.

achievements.name: Indiana Jones Heritage
achievements.description: Purchase the Holy Grail.

achievements.name: To the Moon!
achievements.description: Purchase your own Space Shuttle.

achievements.name: Time to make some democracy
achievements.description: Purchase a Transport Fleet.

achievements.name: Some American encrypted evidences?
achievements.description: Purchase a Private Island in the Pacific.

achievements.name: I know not with what weapons...
achievements.description: Own $100M worth of Defense stocks during World War III.

achievements.name: Ah shit, here we go again
achievements.description: Hold open stock market positions during a Global Crash.

achievements.name: First Dollar
achievements.description: Earn your first net dollar.

achievements.name: Penny Stock Gambler
achievements.description: Buy stocks with a unit value below $10.

achievements.name: Bull Market Spirit
achievements.description: Own a stock portfolio worth over $1,000,000.

achievements.name: Millionaire's Club
achievements.description: Reach $1,000,000 in cash in your account.

achievements.name: Decamillionaire
achievements.description: Accumulate a total net worth of $10,000,000.

achievements.name: HODLER
achievements.description: Hold cryptocurrencies for at least one in-game year.

achievements.name: Diamond Hands
achievements.description: Do not sell stocks when their price drops by more than 40%.

achievements.name: Short Squeeze
achievements.description: Earn 100% on a single trade in less than a week.

achievements.name: Dividend King
achievements.description: Receive total dividends exceeding $50,000.

achievements.name: Market Maker
achievements.description: Own stocks of at least 15 different companies simultaneously.

achievements.name: Crypto Whale
achievements.description: Own cryptocurrencies worth over $5,000,000.

achievements.name: Wolf of Wall Street
achievements.description: Perform a total of 100 stock market operations.

achievements.name: Blood in the Streets
achievements.description: Buy stocks during a global crash.

achievements.name: Homeless No More
achievements.description: Buy your first property.

achievements.name: Landlord
achievements.description: Own 3 properties simultaneously.

achievements.name: Real Estate Tycoon
achievements.description: Own 10 properties simultaneously.

achievements.name: Penthouse Life
achievements.description: Live in a Penthouse or an Apartment in the city center.

achievements.name: Moving Out
achievements.description: Change your Primary Home 3 times.

achievements.name: Architect's Dream
achievements.description: Buy a property on the World Islands in Dubai.

achievements.name: Suburban King
achievements.description: Own 5 houses in suburban locations.

achievements.name: Renovator
achievements.description: Spend a total of $500,000 on property maintenance.

achievements.name: First Ride
achievements.description: Buy your first vehicle.

achievements.name: Petrolhead
achievements.description: Have 5 vehicles in your garage.

achievements.name: Speed Demon
achievements.description: Buy a vehicle worth over $1,000,000.

achievements.name: Eco-Friendly
achievements.description: Own exclusively electric vehicles.

achievements.name: Aviation Beginner
achievements.description: Buy your first helicopter.

achievements.name: Flight High
achievements.description: Own flying vehicles with a total value of $50M.

achievements.name: The Collector
achievements.description: Own a vehicle from every available category.

achievements.name: Shiny Thing
achievements.description: Buy your first valuable item.

achievements.name: Art Collector
achievements.description: Own at least 5 unique works of art.

achievements.name: Safe is Heavy
achievements.description: Own valuables with a total value exceeding $5,000,000.

achievements.name: CEO Status
achievements.description: Become the CEO of Global Enterprises.

achievements.name: Lifelong Learner
achievements.description: Complete 5 different educational courses.

achievements.name: Overqualified
achievements.description: Possess all available certificates and courses.

achievements.name: High Salary
achievements.description: Earn a monthly salary of over $50,000.

achievements.name: Grown Up
achievements.description: Your character has reached 30 years of age.

achievements.name: Midlife Crisis
achievements.description: Buy a supercar after reaching 50 years of age.

achievements.name: Old Money
achievements.description: Survive in the game for 40 years from the start.

achievements.name: Social Elite
achievements.description: Reach 10,000 Global Prestige points.

achievements.name: World Famous
achievements.description: Reach 50,000 Global Prestige points.

achievements.name: Living Legend
achievements.description: Reach 100,000 Global Prestige points.
